name: pantheistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or shows a belief in many or all gods, or the belief that God exists in, and is the same as, all things, animals, and people within the universe: In his speech, he spoke of God pantheistically so as to reach out to everyone in the diverse audience. He describes his view of the land pantheistically, as a caretaker with an eye watching over all.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is a fairy tale that treats nature as a force to be worshipped and elevates it pantheistically. She speaks of God's love in a way that is pantheistically relevant to everyone.
